Title: Relates to identification and screening for deficiencies in executive functioning
Summary: Requires the commissioner of the office of temporary and disability assistance to develop a program and training for the identification and screening for deficiencies in executive functioning.
LawCode: Add ยง152-c, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to identification and screening for deficiencies in executive functioning
